actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the recording of conversations with a President without the prior consent or knowledge of the fact of recording by all parties thereto.

summary.text: Prohibits the recording of conversations with a President without the prior consent or knowledge of the fact of recording by all parties thereto. Provides that any recordings made without consent thereto by the parties being recorded shall not be admissible evidence in any State or Federal proceeding.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the recording of conversations with a President without the prior consent or knowledge of the fact of recording by all parties thereto.
